questions.question: The pressure loss in fluid flow (P <sub>L</sub>) has two components ______ and  _____

answers.a: Friction loss (P<sub>F</sub>) and the Pressure loss (P<sub>L</sub>)
answers.b: Friction loss (P<sub>F</sub>) and the Shock loss (P<sub>X</sub>)
answers.c: Pressure loss (P<sub>L</sub>) and the Shock loss (P<sub>X</sub>)

questions.question: Shock losses also occur at the inlet and outlet of system and at the junction of any air currents.
Kata thermometer can be used to estimate dry Kata cooling power as well as wet Kata cooling power.
